11.03.2013 SH SCR18003 Removed "Graydon" handing
05.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
11.01.2008 AK SCR13239 delete old MQ015 before starting (with BMQ015)
24.12.2007 AK SCR13239 send some more parameters to BMQ001
20.11.2007 AK SCR13075 call BMQ001 instead of direct updating MQHD

08.05.2006 SH SCR10908 Removed test on DBH_DEBTORTYPE <> 1 to send
Graydon requests; If no DHIC row exists then "normal" request will be performed

send Graydon requests
20.04.2006 SH SCR10907 Added part to send requests to Graydon
on 7.7.2005 WJ SCR8585 extend updating of field CLSR_DATEDUNNINGNEXT
//13-10-2003 JP SCR #4502 new handling for finance limit
06.08.2003 RR -> SCR4005 changed date-conditioning
29.07.2003 RR -> SCR4005 changed calculation reg. CLSR_DATEDUNNINGNEXT
//12-06-2003 JP request JP: change LinkQ to LinkIJ on info sources
delete all old rows (OMQ15)
update after 3 dunning letters
update MQ015
send dunning letter to the info source
